Articles.Content: Ah, forget it! I'll go claim a new hill and live deep inside it! My base in a hill!

yup but you did not notice where is the magic boulder

so on i noticed you didn't.

Some things somewhere & the magics boulders whatever @ whoever

I am destined to defend the Great Attractor at all costs, so no one can call it their own. I will defend it using the power of Terahelix.

It is no ones'; I am it's. I will guard it forever.

If Xannari decides to massacre someone's hill on a suspicion, I will protect the ones being attacked...

MY defense!

You suck!

Just don't act suspicious, and/or come near. Doing so will result in your doom.

> 
> You suck!
> Just don't act suspicious, and/or come near. Doing so will result in your doom.

(hey, I remember what happened last time! My fleet stood its ground and you took out about a quarter of it! ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif))

I travel to koth\_trainsawlaser.

I proceed to cap the control point and avoid the resultant TRAINRAIN.

my control point.

Also, any captures of the koth\_trainsawlaser control point will result in train rain. It's part of the map.

He don't care about control point that's

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/VUOe_hLg7Bo?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Benny Hill.

i get jeb to crash an SRB into your hill, killing everything on it. i then claim the hill.

my hill defended by jeb ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Wow. I think this may be the first time in several years that I look in here and the hill is actually more or less intact despite being fought over.

Don't mind me. I'm hiring Jeb and paying more than you do, then enjoying my time launching model rockets off the hill.

shoots down your model rockets with an ion cannon.

shoots odinyggd with an ion cannon.

hires jeb.

my hill defended by jeb and a ion cannon.
Digs under hill and destroys your base and Jeb! My cratered hill!

dumps a whole bunch of dirt on sampa.

my (large) hill with sampa buried underneath.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-05T13:17:49Z" title="09/05/2015 01:17  PM" data-short="8 yr">September 5, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**
I bribe the guards. My hill.

so that's a hill ? oki but i don't think what you call a hill is a hill.

your current momentum knowledge about hills, not mine at all ; )
I sneak the hill into the megaverse. how? science. my hill.
I hide all of the hills around the universe and have people on all of them. Then I make sure there are only 12 rings and make them big circles.
I learn too much about the hill's momentum and it ends up under my feet. My hill.
I destroyed you feet with whole of Imperal Navy. Then have Imperal Navy and Army gaurd my hill. My hill.

nukes.

ion cannon.

my crater defended by an ion cannon.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-09-07T07:04:31Z" title="09/07/2015 07:04  AM" data-short="8 yr">September 7, 2015</time> by icantmakemodels**
I fill your crater with lots of dirt for hill. Have extra. Now everyone who posted here has a hill.![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

\*claims every hill\*

my hills.

Says 10 random words.

My hill.

Fires Mass Accelerator Cannon at all but one of the hills and fortifies the final one in a Dyson sphere.

I've played too much Halo recently.

\*Selects user in teleporter menu, destination: 6th planet of the Hoth system. Planet seems to have been recently taken by the recently defeated Empire.\*

My hill.
